md:
giải nghĩa từ "harm" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Harm (noun) /hɑːm/:
	+ Meaning: damage or injury to someone or something.
	+ Example: The company suffered financial harm due to the economic crisis.
	+ Related words: damage, injury, hurt, wound.
* Harm (verb) /hɑːm/:
	+ Meaning: to cause damage or injury to someone or something.
	+ Example: The pollution will harm the environment if not controlled.
	+ Related words: damage, injure, hurt, wound.

Note: The pronunciation of "harm" is /hɑːm/, with a short "a" sound.
html:
giải nghĩa từ "harm" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Harm (noun) /hɑːm/:
    • Meaning: damage or injury to someone or something.
    • Example: The company suffered financial harm due to the economic crisis.
    • Related words: damage, injury, hurt, wound.
  • Harm (verb) /hɑːm/:
    • Meaning: to cause damage or injury to someone or something.
    • Example: The pollution will harm the environment if not controlled.
    • Related words: damage, injure, hurt, wound.

Note: The pronunciation of "harm" is /hɑːm/, with a short "a" sound.
